PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-03392016-05-13TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Reporting Requirements and International Restrictions on Lithium Batteries)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (PART 8 – REPORTING REQUIREMENTS) in order to update the Regulations to include newsecurity provisions, modify existing reporting requirements and specify the data to be made available for risk analysis.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0095 Publication Date: 2016-06-01
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (PART 8 – REPORTING REQUIREMENTS) in order to update the Regulations to include newsecurity provisions, modify existing reporting requirements and specify the data to be made available for risk analysis.
